item.text: Then I saw a new heaven and a new earth, for the first heaven and earth had ceased to exist, and the sea existed no more.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="1492">saw</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>—the <st data-num="2537" class="">new</st> <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>—<st data-num="2597" class="">descending</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2090">made ready</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3565" class="">bride</st> <st data-num="2885" class="">adorned</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> I <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2362" class="">throne</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying:</st> “<st data-num="2400">Look</st>! The <st data-num="4633" class="">residence</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="3326" class="">among</st> <st data-num="444">human beings</st>.<n id="2" /> He<n id="3" /> will <st data-num="4637" class="">live</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">among</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.<n id="4" />
He will wipe away every tear from their eyes, and death will not exist any more—or mourning, or crying, or pain, for the former things have ceased to exist.”
And the one seated on the throne said: “Look! I am making all things new!” Then he said to me, “Write it down, because these words are reliable and true.”

He <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, “It is <st data-num="1096" class="">done</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510">am</st> the <st data-num="1" class="">Alpha</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5598" class="">Omega</st>, the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st>. To the one who is <st data-num="1372" class="">thirsty</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1432">free of charge</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4077" class="">spring</st> of the <st data-num="5204" class="">water</st> of <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.

The one who <st data-num="3528" class="">conquers</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="2816" class="">inherit</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st>.

But as for the cowards, unbelievers, detestable persons, murderers, the sexually immoral, and those who practice magic spells, idol worshipers, and all those who lie, their place will be in the lake that burns with fire and sulfur. That is the second death.”
Then one of the seven angels who had the seven bowls full of the seven final plagues came and spoke to me, saying, “Come, I will show you the bride, the wife of the Lamb!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="667" class="">took</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="667" class="">away</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="3173" class="">huge</st>, <st data-num="5308" class="">majestic</st> <st data-num="3735" class="">mountain</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1166" class="">showed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st>, <st data-num="2597" class="">descending</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

The city <st data-num="2192" class="">possesses</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of <st data-num="2316">God</st>; <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="5458" class="">brilliance</st> is <st data-num="3664">like</st> a <st data-num="5093" class="">precious</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">jewel</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st> of <st data-num="2929" class="">crystal-clear</st> <st data-num="2393" class="">jasper</st>.<n id="2" />

It <st data-num="2192" class="">has</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="3173" class="">massive</st>, <st data-num="5308" class="">high</st> <st data-num="5038" class="">wall</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st> <st data-num="4440" class="">gates</st>,<n id="3" /> with <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="4440" class="">gates</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">names</st> of the <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st> <st data-num="5443" class="">tribes</st> of the <st data-num="5207" class="">nation</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1924">written on</st> the gates.<n id="5" />

There are<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="4440" class="">gates</st> <st data-num="575" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="395">east side</st>, <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="4440" class="">gates</st> <st data-num="575" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1005">north side</st>, <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="4440" class="">gates</st> <st data-num="575" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3558">south side</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="4440" class="">gates</st> <st data-num="575" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1424">west side</st>.<n id="2" />
The wall of the city has twelve foundations, and on them are the twelve names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb.
The angel who spoke to me had a golden measuring rod with which to measure the city and its foundation stones and wall.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> is <st data-num="2749">laid out</st> as a <st data-num="5068" class="">square</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="3372" class="">length</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4114" class="">width</st> <st data-num="3745">the same</st>. He<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3354" class="">measured</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> with the <st data-num="2563" class="">measuring rod</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> <st data-num="4712 1427 5505">1,400 miles</st><n id="5" /> (<st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="3372" class="">length</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4114" class="">width</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5311" class="">height</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2470" class="">equal</st>).

He <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="3354" class="">measured</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="5038" class="">wall</st>, <st data-num="1540 5062 5064">144</st> <st data-num="4083" class="">cubits</st><n id="1" /> according to <st data-num="444" class="">human</st> <st data-num="3358" class="">measurement</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> also the <st data-num="32">angel’s</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="846">The city’s</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5038" class="">wall</st> is <st data-num="1739" class="">made</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2393" class="">jasper</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> is <st data-num="2513" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="5553" class="">gold</st>, <st data-num="3664" class="">like</st> <st data-num="2513" class="">transparent</st> <st data-num="5194" class="">glass</st>.<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="2310" class="">foundations</st> of the <st data-num="4172">city’s</st> <st data-num="5038" class="">wall</st> are <st data-num="2885" class="">decorated</st><n id="1" /> with<st data-num="3956"> every kind</st> of <st data-num="5093" class="">precious</st> <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st>. The <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="2310" class="">foundation</st> is <st data-num="2393" class="">jasper</st>, the <st data-num="1208" class="">second</st> <st data-num="4552" class="">sapphire</st>, the <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> <st data-num="5472" class="">agate</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="5067" class="">fourth</st> <st data-num="4665" class="">emerald</st>,

the <st data-num="3991" class="">fifth</st> <st data-num="4557" class="">onyx</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="1623" class="">sixth</st> <st data-num="4556" class="">carnelian</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="1442" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="5555" class="">chrysolite</st>,<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3590" class="">eighth</st> <st data-num="969" class="">beryl</st>,<n id="4" /> the <st data-num="1766" class="">ninth</st> <st data-num="5116" class="">topaz</st>, the <st data-num="1182" class="">tenth</st> <st data-num="5556" class="">chrysoprase</st>,<n id="5" /> the <st data-num="1734" class="">eleventh</st> <st data-num="5192" class="">jacinth</st>,<n id="6" /> and the <st data-num="1428" class="">twelfth</st> <st data-num="271" class="">amethyst</st>.
And the twelve gates are twelve pearls—each one of the gates is made from just one pearl! The main street of the city is pure gold, like transparent glass.
Now I saw no temple in the city, because the Lord God—the All-Powerful—and the Lamb are its temple.

The <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">does</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> the <st data-num="2246" class="">sun</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="4582" class="">moon</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="5316" class="">shine</st> on <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="5461" class="">lights</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="5461" class="">up</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="3088" class="">lamp</st> is the <st data-num="721" class="">Lamb</st>.

The <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">its</st> <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">kings</st> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> will <st data-num="5342" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">grandeur</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="846" class="">Its</st> <st data-num="4440" class="">gates</st> will <st data-num="3756 3361">never</st> be <st data-num="2808" class="">closed</st> during the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st><n id="1" /> (and<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st> will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>).<n id="3" />

They will <st data-num="5342" class="">bring</st> the <st data-num="1391" class="">grandeur</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5092" class="">wealth</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="1484" class="">nations</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>,
but nothing ritually unclean will ever enter into it, nor anyone who does what is detestable or practices falsehood, but only those whose names are written in the Lamb’s book of life.
